form.official-title: To amend the Securities Act of 1933 to expand the research report exception to include reports about any issuer that undertakes a proposed offering of public securities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securities Research Modernization Act.
Section 2(a)(3) of the Securities Act of 1933 (15 U.S.C. 77b(a)(3)) is amended—

subsection.text: by striking an emerging growth company and inserting an issuer;
by striking the common equity and inserting any; and
by striking such emerging growth company and inserting such issuer.
